moves.name: Pin Missile
moves.effect: Attacks the target two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Dire Hit +
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s critical-hit rate.

moves.name: First Impression
moves.effect: This move fails if this sync pair has used any moves since entering battle.

moves.name: Beat ’Em Down!
moves.effect: Uses a maximum of three slots of the user’s move gauge. Based on the amount used, this move raises the user’s Attack and Defense by up to four stat ranks.

passives.name: Danger Dodge 2
passives.description: Sharply raises the user’s evasiveness when the user’s HP drops to half or below for the first time in a battle.
